verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will enter His gates
With thanksgiving in my heart
I will enter Hist courts with praise
I will say, "This is the day
--that the Lord has made!"
I will rejoice for He has made me glad.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He has made me glad,
He has made me glad
I will rejoice for He has made me glad.
